title: I Adore You as I Adore the Vault of the Night Sky, O Vessel of Sadness, O Tall Silent Woman (Je t'adore à l'égal de la voûte nocturne. O vase de tristesse, o grande taciturne) from The Flowers of Evil (Les Fleurs du mal)
medium: One from a portfolio of nine photogravures (including cover)
credits: Gift of The Ian Woodner Family Collection
